titles.title: Ending Subsidies for Big Oil Act of 2007
Ending Subsidies for Big Oil Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that oil and gas companies will not be eligible for the effective rate reductions enacted in 2004 for domestic manufacturers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Ending Subsidies for Big Oil Act of 2007- Amends the Internal Revenue Code to deny a tax deduction for income attributable to the sale, exchange, or other disposition of oil, natural gas, or any primary product thereof.
